name: Slumber Stare
description:
You and your friend have been invited to The Slumber Stare, avoid the soul of previous participants and keep staring at each other. Once either of you blinks, both of you will fall to eternal slumber.

Controls

Replenish bar: A (Left Character) and D (Right Character) on Blink mode

Jump : A (Left Character) and D (Right Character) on Jump mode

Change mode (Blink / Jump) : S

Credits

Music: Pappa Parappa - https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play9689.html
